titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Virginia Tech Dining Services Records, 1994-2013
titlestmt.subtitle: Virginia Tech Dining Services Records RG 8/2/1j

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-05-18T15:38-0400

titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections RG 8/2/1j

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Virginia Tech Dining Services Records, 1994-2013
did.abstract: The Virginia Tech Dining Services Records comprises award submission scrapbooks for events and dinners hosted by the Dining Services department of the Division of Student Affairs that were compiled and submitted for awards from 1994 through 2013. A 2009 schematic design for the food court Turner Place at Lavery Hall is also included.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. Division of Student Affairs. Dining Services.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Virginia Tech Dining Services Records must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Virginia Tech Dining Services Records, RG 8/2/1j, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Virginia Tech Dining Services Records were transferred to Special Collections in 2014.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Virginia Tech Dining Services Records was completed in May 2015.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Dining Services department of Virginia Tech is a part of the Division of Student Affairs (DSA), lead by the Vice President for Student Affairs. It was previously known as the Culinary Services department and the Dining Programs department as well as being combined with what is now the Housing and Residence Life department, also within the DSA.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Virginia Tech Dining Services Records primarily comprise award submission scrapbooks for events and dinners hosted by the Dining Services department of the Division of Student Affairs that were compiled and submitted for awards from 1994 through 2013. Awards include the the National Association of College and University Food Services's Loyal E. Horton Dining Awards, Most Innovative Nutrition Program Contest, and Vegetarian Marketplace Competition as well as Cuisine Creators's Vegan Recipe Contest and Most Creative Nutrition Month Promotion. A 2009 schematic design for the food court Turner Place at Lavery Hall is also included.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by type of material.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Record Group Vertical Files, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va. Finding aid: http://ead.lib.virginia.edu/vivaxtf/view?docId=vt/viblbv01186.xml
